hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp

Class JNotepadPP

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.JNotepadPP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationListener, Notepad, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class JNotepadPP
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements Notepad, ILocalizationListener
    Notepad implementation that enables use of many NotepadEditor s at the same time.

    Also implements ILocalizationListener to enable localization. Requires language_"language".properties files for the localization to work.

    Uses NotepadEditor as tabs.

    Creates a working notepad window ready for customer use.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
    See Also:
    Notepad, IconPack, ILocalizationProvider, Serialized Form
